entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023
